Posts.EditableText: Mafia Life - a text based mafia game is a new game launching soon. There are no limits to who you can be with infinite ways to play. Build your wealth, power and respect. Compete with other players around the world. Find friends, or enemies, by teaming up or creating your own Mafia family... and much more. Are you up to the challenge of becoming the best?
Posts.HTML:
Mafia Life - a text based mafia game is a new game launching soon.

There are no limits to who you can be with infinite ways to play.

Build your wealth, power and respect. Compete with other players around the world. Find friends, or enemies, by teaming up or creating your own Mafia family... and much more.

Are you up to the challenge of becoming the best?
